price: (4) The angels and the Spirit [i.e., Gabriel] descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.[1955]
arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ
footnotes: [1955]- Bringing the exact measures apportioned for everything by Allāh in the course of the coming year.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: tanazzalu al-malāikatu wal-rūḥu fīhā bi-idh'ni rabbihim min kulli amrin
